Posts.EditableText: How to change background color? Also, please tell me if the background can change colors multiple times! Thanks!
Posts.HTML: How to change background color? Also, please tell me if the background can change colors multiple times! Thanks!

Yes it can.

$("body").css("background-color", "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)");
$("body").css("color", "yellow");

Make sure you have 4 spaces before each of those lines.
